metadata.synopsis: Safyre is dating Limmy, and they're meant to be shopping for a suit for him - but he keeps getting sidetracked. They don't have the best couple dynamic - Limmy is immature and prone to (expensive) spontaneous purposes, while Safyre is passive-aggressive, demanding, and has a bit of a mean girl vibe. This is the boyfriend's one-liner.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Go to 4; 49; 130- Talk to the human.

0.speaker: Limmy
0.text: You have got to check out Danthelon's Dancing Axe - their leatherwork is amazing.

1.speaker: Limmy
1.text: Don't forget to visit the Velveteen Elixir! Us adventurers have to be keep stocked up.
